transcript: here's an easy way that you can get more money from every single customer that you sign up whenever you sign them up and you're getting their credit card ask them for a second form of payment and you can waive a credit card fee that you would normally charge if they add a second one and you're like this is just because it decreases our admin cost and God forbid you get your identity stolen we don't have to interrupt your service when you do it that way you already have the first card you ask for the second it gives them a discount gives you a second form of payment so that when that decline does happen you have a second one that you can hit immediately
